title: What kind of acoustic guitar does Paul McCartney often use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both Paul and John own identical models of a Gibson electric acoustic guitar, with built in pick up. I didn’t know at the time when I first saw photos of them using those guitars. But they are the reason I use Gibson acoustic to this day. I love their sound.

Early on his Epiphone Texan, then he went with the best guitar Martin has ever made in reality , the D 28 . Regardless of none of the frills , the D28 is Martins great sounding workhorse . In respect to acoustic 12 string, I don’t know ?
